attributes.action: abandon plans to reduce the National Speed Limit to 50mph.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Government is proposing to reduce the National Speed Limit to 50mph on all rural roads on safety grounds.
As only a tiny minority (6% by the DfT's reckoning) of accidents are actually caused by exceeding the speed limit, this will be utterly ineffective. Effort should be concentrated on engineering solutions to the real problem: our outdated road network.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
